definition: to go against/to be contrary to/perverse/rebellious
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

sentences.english: For I knew that you would deal very treacherously And would be called a transgressor from the womb.
sentences.chinese: 我原知道你行事极其诡诈，你从母腹里便称为悖逆的。

sentences.english: God makes just condemnations of sin and unbelief.
sentences.chinese: 神对罪与悖逆发出公义的责难。

sentences.english: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
sentences.chinese: 以前，我毁灭了努哈的宗族，他们确是悖逆的民众。

sentences.english: Adam and Eve realized too late the serious sin of disobeying God.
sentences.chinese: 由于悖逆的罪，他们的整个世界完全改变了。

sentences.english: Why should you be beaten anymore? Why do you persist in rebellion?
sentences.chinese: 你们为什么屡次悖逆，还要受责打吗？

sentences.english: Repentance is God' s way of making the crooked straight.
sentences.chinese: 唯有悔改才能让上帝修直我们的弯曲悖逆。

sentences.english: How often they rebelled against him in the desert and grieved him in the wasteland!
sentences.chinese: 他们在旷野悖逆他，在荒地叫他担忧，何其多呢？

sentences.english: For I know how rebellious and stiff-necked you are.
sentences.chinese: 因为我知道你们是悖逆的，是硬着颈项的。

sentences.english: But they put God to the test and rebelled against the Most High; they did not keep his statutes.
sentences.chinese: 他们仍旧试探悖逆至高的神，不守他的法度。

sentences.english: Turn ye unto him from whom the children of Israel have deeply revolted.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人哪，你们深深的悖逆耶和华，现今要归向他。

sentences.english: How oft did they provoke him in the wilderness, and grieve him in the desert!
sentences.chinese: 他们在旷野悖逆他，在荒地叫他担忧，何其多呢？

sentences.english: Say now to the rebellious house, Know ye not what these things mean?
sentences.chinese: 你对那悖逆之家说，你们不知道这些事是什么意思吗。

sentences.english: Only the repentance to make God to trim our revolt.
sentences.chinese: 唯有悔改才能让上帝修直我们的弯曲悖逆。

sentences.english: Yet they tempted and provoked the most high God, and kept not his testimonies
sentences.chinese: 他们仍旧试探悖逆至高的神，不守他的法度。

definition: to break an agreement/to go back on one's word/to fail to keep one's promise
